title: Golden Sun - Ultimate Collection.7z
description:
This ultimate collection includes:
1. All three games in the Golden Sun series

2. Emulators needed to play all three games

3. Prima Game Guides for all three games

4. A password generator to create fake import codes for The Lost Age

5. All music from all three games

6. All image sprites from the first two games including summons

7. No setup/hassle required*! Run the emulator from the game folder and open the game file and you're good to go!

*Dark Dawn has a sound issue, the fix is included as a notepad file in it's folder titled "HOW TO STOP THE LOUD BUZZING IN DARK DAWN"

I compiled this torrent from multiple sources, so I scanned it all with Avast! free antivirus to make sure nothing I downloaded was harmful before uploading this torrent and I didn't even get any false positives. Please run your own scans and post your results so people know this is legit!

Keep these games alive! Seed your heart out!
